verses.roman:
ethā prabhu sei manuṣyere praśna kaila
"vāṇīnātha ki kare, yabe bāndhiyā ānila?"

synonyms: ethā—here; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sei manuṣyere—unto that person who brought the message; praśna kaila—inquired; vāṇīnātha ki kare—what was Vāṇīnātha doing; yabe—when; bāndhiyā ānila—he was arrested and brought there.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu inquired from the messenger, "What was Vāṇīnātha doing when he was arrested and brought there?"
